info.name: Mintro API
info.description:
Complete Mintro API documentation covering all Edge Functions. Professional collection for frontend integration and testing.

## Getting Started
1. Set the ANON_KEY variable to your Supabase anon key
2. Use the Authentication endpoints to get an ACCESS_TOKEN
3. Set the ACCESS_TOKEN variable
4. You're ready to use all other endpoints!

item.name: üîê Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints using Supabase Auth. Get tokens to use with other API calls.

request.description: Sign in with email and password. Returns access_token and refresh_token. Use the access_token in the Authorization header for subsequent API calls.
Register a new user account. Email confirmation may be required depending on your Supabase settings.

response.name: Email Already Registered

request.description: Get a new access token using your refresh token. Use this when your access_token expires.

item.name: Invoices
item.description: Invoice management, creation, and profit tracking

request.description: Retrieves a paginated list of invoices with optional filtering.

item.description: Multiple examples of creating invoices with different options

request.description: Create a basic invoice and link transactions immediately for automatic cost tracking.

item.name: üìä Analytics & Profitability
item.description: Business analytics, profitability tracking, and margin analysis. The profitability engine calculates profit using linked bank transactions as the primary cost source. Blueprints and manual overrides are optional enhancements.

request.description: Get comprehensive dashboard summary with KPIs, recent activity, and alerts.

originalRequest.description: Get comprehensive dashboard summary with KPIs, recent activity, and alerts.

request.description: Get comprehensive profitability analysis. Calculates profit using linked bank transactions as primary cost source. Works for ALL invoices - blueprints are optional.

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Get comprehensive profitability analysis. Calculates profit using linked bank transactions as primary cost source. Works for ALL invoices - blueprints are optional.

request.description: Get aggregate variance analysis comparing Blueprint Estimates vs Actual Costs across all jobs. Only includes jobs that have blueprint estimates attached.

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Get aggregate variance analysis comparing Blueprint Estimates vs Actual Costs across all jobs. Only includes jobs that have blueprint estimates attached.

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "period": {
    "start_date": "2025-01-01",
    "end_date": "2025-12-31"
  },
  "summary": {
    "total_invoices": 45,
    "total_revenue": 150000,
    "total_estimated_cost": 80000,
    "total_actual_cost": 82000,
    "net_cost_variance": 2000,
    "avg_variance_percent": 2.5,
    "jobs_with_estimates": 20,
    "jobs_under_budget": 12,
    "jobs_over_budget": 5,
    "jobs_on_budget": 3
  },
  "performance_status": "over_budget",
  "message": "Tracking 2000.00 over budget across 20 estimated jobs."
}
